segments.advisor_message: Alright, let's move on to discussing your dependents. Can you tell me the full name of your dependent? Just to confirm, can you hear me okay?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I can hear you fine! My dependent's name is Emily Johnson.

segments.advisor_message: Great! Thanks for that. And when was Emily born? I need the date of birth in DD-MM-YYYY format.
segments.client_message: She was born on 15-03-2015. Also, just to let you know, she will be a dependent until she turns 18, so that would be until 15-03-2033.
